description:
This is a Mega Death Boss model for all your miniature 28mm tabletop games such as Dungeons and Dragons and Pathfinder. This easy craft will save you valuable time, so you have more hours to play the games you love. The materials to craft the Mega Death Boss are also cheap and easy to obtain so this project won’t break your budget. Bring a few crafting supplies and sit down with DM Scotty to begin your DIY crafting adventure. You can find the tools you need at my website ( http://www.thedmscraft.com/ ). So grab your gluegun and Go Forth and Craft.

Scotty’s favorite glue gun (affiliated link): http://amzn.to/2gYKRhV

For more information on DM crafting visit my website and see what you need for your starting DM crafting kit:
http://www.thedmscraft.com/

The Tabletop Crafters Guild Site:
http://www.tabletopcraftersguild.com/

Become a friend to the Craft and help me bring more content to the community by joining my Patreon. You will have access to exclusive DM Scotty content:  https://www.patreon.com/theDMsCraft?ty=h

Join The Tabletop Crafters Guild Facebook group for more crafts and camaraderie. 
https://www.facebook.com/groups/dmscottyscraftsngames/

Twitter: @TheDMsCraft

Music: "Epic Battle And War Music," under royalty free license from Footage Firm Inc.

DISCLAIMER: This video and description contains affiliate links, which means that if you click on one of the product links, I’ll receive a small commission. This helps support the channel and allows DM Scotty to continue to make videos for our community. Thank you for the support and Go Forth and Craft
title: MEGA  DEATH BOSS Dungeons and Dragons Fight Encounter (The DM's Craft #98)
